newsitem.title: USA: Allegheny Teledyne expects lower Q3 results.
newsitem.headline: Allegheny Teledyne expects lower Q3 results.

text.p: Allegheny Teledyne Inc said Wednesday it expects its specialty metals segment to hurt its third quarter results.
The company cited, in part, poor pricing in the stainless steel markets.

President and Chief Executive William Rutledge said it appeared that operating profits in the third quarter would be down from year-earlier pro forma results, when it had net income of $64 million, or $0.36 per share, on combined sales of $967 million.
